name: Yolei Inoue
effect: [Start of Your Main Phase] If you have a red Digimon in play, gain 1 memory.[Your Turn] When one of your Digimon with 2 or more colors attacks, you may suspend this Tamer to delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
